de.renew.dbnets.binder

Class ReadArcBinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.renew.net.arc.InputArcBinder
      • de.renew.dbnets.binder.ReadArcBinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.renew.engine.searcher.Binder

    public class ReadArcBinder
extends de.renew.net.arc.InputArcBinder
    The db-net's read arc's binder. Maps the read arc's variables to the retrieved (from the db-net's persistence layer) values through the corresponding view place's query call.
    Author:
    Anton Rigin, National Research University - Higher School of Economics, Faculty of Computer Science, Master Degree Program "System and Software Engineering", the 1st year student. Term Project (Coursework) on the Topic "Reference and Data Semantic-Based Simulator of Petri Nets Extension with the Use of Renew Tool". HSE University, Moscow, Russia, 2019 - 2020.

                     java.sql.Connection connection)
        The binder's constructor.
        Parameters:
        tokenVariable - The read arc's token inscription variable.
        delayVariable - The read arc's delay variable.
        placeInstance - The instance of the view place which is one of the ends of the read arc.
        variableMapper - The transition instance's variable mapper. Maps the net's variables' names into their values.
        stateRecorder - The state recorder instance.
        connection - The database connection instance.

    • Method Detail

      • bindingBadness

        public int bindingBadness(de.renew.engine.searcher.Searcher searcher)
        Returns how possible the binder can be bound. The higher badness - the worse. The binders with the max badness cannot be bound.
        Specified by:
        bindingBadness in interface de.renew.engine.searcher.Binder
        Parameters:
        searcher - The searcher instance.
        Returns:
        How possible the binder can be bound. The higher badness - the worse. The binders with the max badness cannot be bound.
